nodes.text: The Sparrowhawk was an aging Kom'rk-class fighter/transport owned by the retired pirate Delphi Kloda. He let his former student Bazine Netal borrow it for her mission to Vashka if she helped train the slicer Orri Tenro. After Kloda betrayed Netal during the mission, Bazine seized it for herself.
The Sparrowhawk appears in Delilah S. Dawson's 2015 canon short story "The Perfect Weapon," part of Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens.
